name: holiday-particle-tree
description: Interactive Holiday Particle Tree with hand gesture controls

scripts.build: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path build) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path build | Out-Null; Copy-Item index.html build/; if (Test-Path media) { Copy-Item -Recurse media build/ }" && node scripts/generate-manifest.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx gh-pages -d build
